name: The Building (ObsidianBlk)
description:
This game was made by Bryan "ObsidianBlk" Miller for the Themed Horror Jam #5 using the Godot Engine (v3.4.2)

Source code for this game can be found on Github if you are interested in my mess, lol!

The game was developed and tested on Linux.

---

Known Issues:

The main bad guy should work most of the time, but does exhibit some odd behavior I have not had the time to fully track down. Shouldn't interfere with game progression.

Intermittently, some audio will fail to play after returning to the main menu upon death or game completion.

Once in the game proper, there is no exit... honestly, not sure if I should call this an issue, or a feature.
